cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.instructions: 1. Rim the glass with salt. 2. Fill a shaker with ice. 3. Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice. 4. Shake well. 5. Strain into the prepared glass filled with ice. 6. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a mixing glass with ice. 2. Add gin and dry vermouth. 3. Stir well. 4. Strain into a chilled martini glass. 5. Garnish with olives.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a blender with ice. 2. Add white rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. 3. Blend until smooth. 4. Pour into a hurricane glass. 5. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a mixing glass with ice. 2. Add gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth. 3. Stir well. 4. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. 5. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.instructions: 1. Cut the lime into wedges and muddle with sugar in a glass. 2. Fill the glass with crushed ice. 3. Pour cachaça over the ice. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a copper mug with ice. 2. Add vodka and lime juice. 3. Top with ginger beer. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: 1. Muddle sugar and bitters in a glass. 2. Add a splash of water. 3. Fill the glass with ice. 4. Add bourbon. 5. Stir gently. 6. Garnish with an orange peel and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Sangria
cocktails.instructions: 1. Mix red wine, orange liqueur, orange juice, lemon juice, lime juice, and sugar in a pitcher. 2. Add orange, lemon, and lime slices. 3. Stir well. 4. Fill a wine glass with ice. 5. Pour the sangria into the glass, including the fruit slices.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a shaker with ice. 2. Add vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice. 3. Shake well. 4. Strain into a chilled martini glass. 5. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.instructions: 1. Muddle mint leaves and sugar with a splash of lime juice in a glass. 2. Fill the glass with ice. 3. Add white rum and lime juice. 4. Stir gently. 5. Top with club soda. 6. Garnish with a lime wedge and a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.instructions: 1. Rim the glass with celery salt. 2. Fill the glass with ice. 3. Add vodka, tomato juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, lemon juice, celery salt, and black pepper. 4. Stir well. 5. Garnish with a celery stalk, lemon wedge, and olive.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a shaker with ice. 2. Add white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup. 3. Shake well. 4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. 5. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a shaker with ice. 2. Add bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup. 3. Shake well. 4. Fill a rocks glass with ice. 5. Strain the mixture into the glass. 6. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Gin and Tonic
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice. 2. Add gin. 3. Top with tonic water. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill an old fashioned glass with ice. 2. Add vodka and coffee liqueur. 3. Stir gently. 4. Float the cream on top. 5. Serve without mixing.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a mixing glass with ice. 2. Add bourbon, sweet vermouth, and bitters. 3. Stir well. 4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. 5. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a shaker with ice. 2. Add vodka, tequila, rum, gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup. 3. Shake well. 4. Fill a Collins glass with ice. 5. Strain the mixture into the glass. 6. Top with cola. 7. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.instructions: 1. Muddle mint leaves and simple syrup in a mint julep cup. 2. Fill the cup with crushed ice. 3. Add bourbon. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a blender with ice. 2. Add white rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. 3. Blend until smooth. 4. Pour into a hurricane glass. 5. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice. 2. Add vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice. 3. Stir gently. 4. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice. 2. Add vodka. 3. Top with orange juice. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: White Wine Spritzer
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a wine glass with ice. 2. Add white wine. 3. Top with club soda. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Ginger
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice. 2. Add whiskey. 3. Top with ginger ale. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill a highball glass with ice. 2. Add tequila and orange juice. 3. Stir gently. 4. Slowly pour grenadine down the side of the glass. 5. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.instructions: 1. Fill an Irish coffee glass with hot water to preheat it. 2. Empty the glass. 3. Add sugar and hot coffee. 4. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. 5. Add Irish whiskey. 6. Stir gently. 7. Top with whipped cream.
